excerpt: "“Technology is not the end, it’s a means,” he stressed. The U.S. Marine Corps shares this perspective. Col. Ross Monta, portfolio manager for command element systems in the USMC Systems Command, emphasized that the service branch is “not going to replace a Marine’s decision space, that commander’s decision space.”"
